short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find actions on the news you are reading

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find actions on the news you are reading to find actions that can make a positive impact. Bridged also allows you to amplify your impact by sharing actions with your network
